title: E-commerce Platform
description: A fully functional e-commerce web app with authentication, cart, admin panel, and payment integration.
details: This project includes a user-friendly frontend, a secure backend API, and a robust database structure using MongoDB. Stripe is integrated for handling online payments, and there's also an admin dashboard for managing products and orders.

title: Blog Platform
description: A multi-user blog application with markdown support, authentication and role-based dashboard.
details: Users can register, write articles in markdown, edit and delete posts. Admins can manage users. Realtime Firebase database ensures fast performance.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio built using modern web technologies and deployed on Vercel.
details: Showcasing my skills, projects, and contact form. Includes dark/light mode, smooth scroll, and responsive layout.
